quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因"pet"（宠物）的形近联想，将"petrology"误判为"宠物相关的学科"（如"宠物学"）。
quiz_item.sentence: The professor specializing in **petrology** often takes students on field trips to study the composition of volcanic rocks.

option.definition: 宠物学（研究宠物饲养与行为的学科）
